title: How to create a breakout room in Zoom - Quora

response.answer_text: Breakout rooms allow you to split your Zoom meeting in up to 50 separate sessions. The meeting host can choose to split the participants of the meeting into these separate sessions automatically or manually, and can switch between sessions at any time. How to create Breakout room: Note: You can also pre-assign participants to breakout rooms when you schedule the meeting instead of managing them during the meeting. Start an instant or scheduled meeting.Click breakout rooms.Select the number of rooms you would like to create, and how you would like to assign your participants to those rooms.Types of room:Automatically: Let Zoom split your participants up evenly into each of the rooms.Manually: Choose which participants you would like in each room.Click Create breakout rooms. 6. Your rooms will be created, but will not start automatically. You can manage the rooms prior to starting them by following the instructions below. Hope that answered your question. For more details go to zoom support. Source : Managing breakout rooms

It is so easy to create zoom breakout rooms Let’s know how? Start an instant or scheduled meeting.Click breakout rooms.Select the number of rooms you would like to create, and how you would like to assign your participants to those rooms: Automatically: Then zoom will arrange it automaically.Click Create RoomsPlease Upvote If You Found The Answer Helpful. Cheers! Harshit
